features: 【Robust Cleaning Abilities】AIDEA laundry sheets' special formula contains potent cleansers and stain removers that activate quickly during the washing process, penetrating clothing fibers rapidly. Furthermore, the low foam characteristic of laundry sheets makes them highly suitable for efficient washing and easy rinsing, eliminating the need for additional rinse cycles. More water-efficient!

【Gentle for Sensitive Skin】The special formula of AIDEA laundry sheets has been carefully developed to exclude common skin irritants(paraben-free). And are gentle enough for even the most sensitive skin. Additionally, the low foam generated by laundry sheets during washing reduces the skin's exposure to the detergent, further lowering the risk of allergies.

【No Plastic Jug】One of the significant advantages of AIDEA laundry detergent sheets over traditional liquids is the elimination of plastic jug packaging. This helps reduce plastic jug waste and contributes to environmental conservation.

【Easy to Store and Portability】AIDEA laundry sheets are light weight and small size need less space. It's easy to store and also convenient for Portability. You can easily carry them to the laundromat, while traveling, or when visiting friends without adding much weight or taking up space.

【No Measuring & No Mess】Traditional liquid laundry detergent can be messy and take up space. Measuring out detergent, whether it's liquid or powder, can lead to spills. AIDEA laundry sheets are compact and lightweight, 1 Sheet=2 Loads, No measuring and nothing to spill.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: About AIDEA Laundry Detergent Sheets AIDEA laundry detergent sheets are engineered to penetrate deep into fabric fibers, ensuring that even the most stubborn stains and grime are lifted and removed with ease. Not only do our detergent sheets remove stains, but they also neutralize odors, leaving your laundry smelling fresh and inviting. Whether you have a standard or high-efficiency washing machine, our detergent sheets are suitable for all types of machines and water temperatures.

Easy to Carry Each box contains several compact packages of laundry detergent sheets. These thoughtfully designed packages offer a space-saving, travel-friendly solution that ensures your laundry needs are met with ease and convenience while on the go.

Space-Saving The compact size of laundry detergent sheets means you no longer need to store bulky detergent bottles or packaging. This makes them an ideal choice for small living spaces or crowded laundry areas. Convenient Usage No more dealing with messy liquid or powder detergents. Simply place one sheet into the washing machine and start the washing cycle. No measuring or pouring required, saving you valuable time and effort. Sensitive Skin Friendly AIDEA laundry detergent sheets are free from harmful chemicals, making them suitable for sensitive skin. They do not leave residue on your clothes during the washing process, ensuring your garments remain soft and fresh, while being gentle on the skin.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great alternative to traditional detergents
reviews.reviewText: These laundry sheets are cost-effective, eco-friendly and convenient to use and store in small spaces and for traveling. Good to put in a care package for those living in college dorms or small apartments. Most laundry sheets I've used before were about the size of a dryer sheet, but these are much larger (bigger than a piece of printer paper) so I cut or tear them into smaller pieces depending on the size and soil level of the load,

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Economical, convenient, and works well
reviews.reviewText: I dislike the cheap scents that are put in most laundry detergents and this product is totally unscented and hypoalergenic. The sheets conveniently fit into a drawer in the laundary room, are inexpensive compared to the big brand laundry detergents (whose price includes a pretty hefty advertising budget), and work well getting my laundry clean.Some of the very few negative reviews for this product complain about no "suds" and no "clean" scent.First, detergents help water dissolve oils and dirt so that they can be removed from fabrics. The "suds" of commercial laundary detergents come from added chemicals to imitate soap suds. Suds do not clean better and this product doesn't contain chemicals to make fake soap suds.Second, "clean" does not have a scent. It usually means the absence of odor. Commercial laundry detergents often add artificial scents that some people confuse with being clean.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars So far so good
reviews.reviewText: I thought I would give these a try. It's supposed to be more environmentally friendly. It cleans like it's supposed to. I don't see any weird residues in my washer. Smells good. No complaints. I mix it with oxyclean for washing clothes and sometimes some borax for items that have real bad stains on them. Plus side, it's compact. Wrapping is paper instead of unrecyclable plastic

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Love the packaging, love the sheet size and they work wonderfully! I tear the sheets into tiny pieces and add to the laundry machine and it gets everything nice and clean. Those complaining about the lack of scent making them feel like their clothes aren't clean should add some essential oils or get some scent boosters or something. These sheets get body odor, onion and garlic scents, and pet odors out leaving my clothes smelling clean with no odors. They are clean with no scent and that is great!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Love it! So simple to use. I have to watch what I use from a slight allergy. Love the scent is very light. Clothes looked cleaner than with a name brand pod

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Detergent sheets are the most wonderful idea!
reviews.reviewText: These are excellent!!This was my first inroduction to sheet detergent, having discovered it on Amazon. It is fantastic. Economical, and seems to clean better with the first three washings. getting used to putting in dry sheets; kinda wierd at first but I am a committed user now. No more hauling lquids!!I have since seen my first tv commercial for this type of product, so it is becoming more available.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewText: These seem to clean well and the scent is very nice however it's pretty much non-existent after the wash is complete which is not exactly what I was looking for but for the price I guess I can't complain.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewText: These have forked fine. If you know what you're getting and know what to expect, you won't be disappointed.One thing people forget, suds doesn't mean clean. I use handmade soaps often and those don't suds up.As long as my linens are clean, that's what counts.Also, these are awesome for RVs and camping. They take up less space and don't have to worry about altitude or temps.
